main event: A local resident observed two luminous objects in the sky over Greenville, North Carolina on 6 February 1954.
interesting points: The objects were round, bright white lights moving rapidly before disappearing., The sighting was reported to local authorities and subsequently investigated by the United States Air Force., On 15 February 1954, a report described a solid small object with a brilliant orange color and twin parallel tails., The objects were observed for lengths of time ranging from 10 to 23 seconds., No sound was reported from the observed objects during sightings.
